fields.description: The amount of minutes the employee may be late before being recorded as late.
fields.label: Grace Period (mins)

fields.description: The amount of minutes the employee may be late without being considered absent.
fields.label: Absent Grace Period (mins)

fields.description: The maximum amount of minutes the employee may clock in before their shift start.
fields.label: Maximum Early Clock-in (mins)

fields.description: The amount of minutes the employee may leave early without being recorded as an early out.
fields.label: Early Out Grace Period (mins)

fields.description: The amount of minutes the employee may leave early without being considered absent.
fields.label: Early Out Absent Grace Period (mins)

fields.description: The maximum amount of minutes the employee may clock out after their shift end.
fields.label: Maximum Late Clock-out (mins)
